page.title: 09LEISURE CHRISTLETON WAVERTON
page.content: {Waverton:}Womens Insitute,Mens Institute,Waverton Wives,Mothers Union,Waverton Singers,Village Fete Commitee,Local History Group, Darby + Joan Club.Cubs,Scouts,Brownies,Guides. {Rowton}:W.I.,History Group. {Christleton}:W.I.,Mens.I,Wives Group, Ladies Guild,Mothers Union,Wednesday Group,Monday Painters,Village Singers, Christleton Players,British Legion, Fete Commitee,Local History Group, Darby+Joan Club, {Sports}:Christleton Sports Centre, Christleton Tennis Club,Christleton Cricket+Football Club,Waverton F.C., Waverton Wanderers,Waverton Cricket Club,Bowling Club,Waverton Riding Stables+Indoor School:Livery Stable, Farmers Sports Club,Road Runners Club. {Hotels,Restaurants & Inns:Trooper Inn Abbots Well Motor Inn,Rowton Hall, Ring'O'Bells,The Plough,The Black Dog.
